entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:45 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -34.5°C
Wind: W 33 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
